bookBuilder.title: Okuyingiza BookBuilder

upload.title: Teeka ebiwandiiko byo
upload.supportedFormats: Ekikkirizibwa: ZIP files ezirimu Word documents (.docx)

messages.importTip: üìù Ekiragiro ky'okuyingiza: Singa ebiwandiiko byo ebya Word birina ebintu eby'enjawulo (emitwe, olukalala lw'ebiri munda, amawulire g'omuwandiisi, n'ebirala), BookBuilder eyinza okukola ebitundu ebirala. Oluvannyuma lw'okuyingiza, osobola okuggyawo ebitundu by'otoyagala n'osimbule ebintu wakati w'Ekitundu eky'omu maaso, Ekitundu ekikulu, n'Ekitundu eky'emabega nga bwe kyetaagisa.
messages.systemPages: Omuko gw'omutwe n'Obuyinza bw'omuwandiisi bikola byennyini - omuko gwonna gw'omutwe/obuyinza bw'omuwandiisi ogwayingiziddwa gwabuusiddwa.
messages.languageNote: Ebiwandiiko bijja kusengejjwa nga tukozesa enkola z'olulimi {{language}}.

classification.title: Kebera okusengejja kw'ebiwandiiko
classification.subtitle: Sika ebitundu wakati w'ebika okutegeka ensengeka y'ekitabo kyo
classification.frontMatterDesc: Omuko gw'omutwe, obuyinza bw'omuwandiisi, okuwaayo, ebigambo eby'omu maaso, olukalala lw'ebiri mu kitabo
classification.mainMatterDesc: Essuula, ebiri mu kitabo, ebintu ebikulu
classification.backMatterDesc: Okumaliriza, ebigambo eby'oku nkomerero, ebyongerwako, olukalala lw'ebigambo, olukalala lw'ebintu, ebyafaayo

validation.noFile: Nsaba olonde fayiro ya ZIP okugitwala.
validation.invalidFile: Nsaba olonde fayiro ya ZIP etuufu.
validation.selectValidFile: Nsaba olonde fayiro ya ZIP etuufu

bookBuilder.dragToReorder: Sika ebitundu okuddamu okusengeka munda mu bika oba kozesa "SIMBULA" dropdown okukyusa ebitundu wakati w'Ekitundu eky'omu maaso/Ekitundu ekikulu/Ekitundu eky'emabega
